header.description: Scalar values displayed in the report header. All three are user-supplied parameters passed through at generation time.

rows.description: All rows from the app_schemas table, projecting id and name columns. No filtering, no joining.

totals.description: No totals section in this report.

semantics: date_from, date_to, and generated_at are display-only pass-through parameters — they do not filter any table rows. All rows from app_schemas are included unconditionally.
transformations: No reshape required — project app_schemas.id and app_schemas.name directly as row_id and row_name.
